meanings.definition: Marked with a branding iron to show ownership
meanings.sent1: The cowboy's horse had a branded mark on its hind leg.
meanings.sent2: The branded cattle roamed freely on the ranch.
meanings.sent3: The branded mug was so hot, it left a mark on the table!
meanings.sent4: Her branded backpack identified her as a student.
meanings.sent5: The branded logo on the product was easily recognizable.

meanings.definition: Having a particular brand or trademark
meanings.sent1: The store only sold branded clothing items.
meanings.sent2: She preferred branded sneakers over generic ones.
meanings.sent3: The branded shirt made him feel like a fashion model.
meanings.sent4: The branded phone was more expensive but worth it.
meanings.sent5: The branded bag was a status symbol among her friends.

meanings.definition: To label or identify with a brand or trademark
meanings.sent1: The company branded their products with a unique logo.
meanings.sent2: He decided to brand his new business with a catchy name.
meanings.sent3: She playfully branded her friend as the 'snack queen'.
meanings.sent4: The chef branded his signature dish with a special sauce.
meanings.sent5: The artist branded her artwork with a distinct style.
